title: Pointing Practice
description: Follow the emoji 🖱️ on the screen and click it 5 times.

title: Single Click Practice
description: Click on the moving emoji 🖱️ as it appears around the screen 5 times.

title: Double Click Practice
description: Double click the emoji 🖱️ 5 times. Watch carefully where it moves!

title: Drag and Drop Practice
description: Drag the emoji 🖱️ from one location to another. Repeat 5 times.

title: Click Shapes Practice
description: Click all the shapes appearing on the screen 5 times.
